fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention

goals__remit:
Merit Consulting House sprl is an international contemporary consulting firm providing turn-key solutions to its clients, taking into account the unique nature of each individual client to deliver a custom-tailored approach to each project. 
Merit Consulting House sprl is committed to deliver the highest quality services and specializes in identifying and managing client’s critical requirements. Our goal is to build partnerships with our clients to support their business growth efforts and to maximize their operational efficiency.
relevant_communication:
Participation in five (5) HORIZON 2020 projects, in which the company mainly undertakes the energy market and regulation analysis, communication strategy, the dissemination activities, the business innovation and exploitation strategies. These projects are:  
- "Democratizing energy markets through the introduction of innovative flexibility-based demand 
response tools and novel business and market models for energy cooperatives" - FLEXCoop (under the Competitive Low-Carbon Energy Call) 
- "Planning and operational tools for optimising energy flows and synergies between energy networks" - PLANET (under the Competitive Low-Carbon Energy Call) 
- "Prefabrication, Recyclability and Modularity for cost reductions in Smart BIPV systems" - PVadapt (under the Building a Low-Carbon, Climate Resilient Future: Secure, Clean and Efficient Energy Call) 
- "BIM-based holistic tools for Energy-driven Renovation of existing Residences" - BIMERR (under the Industrial Sustainability Call) 
- "Integrated Modular Energy Systems and Local Flexibility Trading for Neural Energy Islands" - MERLON (under the Building a Low-Carbon, Climate Resilient Future: Secure, Clean and Efficient Energy Call)
